articles.author: Andrew McDonald, Rosa Prince
articles.title: Betting scandal engulfs UK election – POLITICO - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Conservative figures are accused of betting on the timing of the snap election. The scandal couldn’t come at a worse moment for Rishi Sunak.
articles.content:
British rules mean the date of an election is largely in the prime minister’s gift. Sunak took the country by surprise when he announced a snap poll for July 4. 
But it has since been revealed that … [+1307 chars]

articles.author: Stuart Lau
articles.title: 5 challenges for NATO's next chief Mark Rutte - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: From Trump to Wilders, from a lack of money to a lack of air defense systems, the next NATO secretary-general will have a busy time.
articles.content:
Countries bordering Russia are not Rutte's biggest fans.
They were angry about low Dutch defense spending and are particularly upset that the top role at NATO has always gone to a Western or Norther… [+1173 chars]
